name: OPPO LEARN PRO
description: OPPO LEARN PRO provides an online customized and interactive learning platform with enormous ways of multiple learning through responsive content that can be consumed on any device at any time with one simple click.  With the changing Era towards a more digitalized world and adding into the emerging trends and technological innovations OPPO is providing this learning platform to bring all OPPOers together creating an online community to learn, connect and grow through exchange of knowledge and experiences.   This digital learning platform provides numerous advanced features and tools that helps to escalate ones knowledge and skills in more efficient, effective, and engaging manner. The platform keeps updated with each and every content related to product, training, SOP, important announcements, individual performance update, upcoming events etc. and also most importantly delivers an interactive platform to communicate with other learners.   OPPO learn pro will provide 24X7 learning assistance to all the OPPOers with no halt in enhancing their skills.   Get the app and start your learnings today!
